statements: SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_disposal_patterns ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT id, location, disposal_date FROM biodegradable_waste_disposal_patterns WHERE waste_type = 'organic'
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_disposal_patterns WHERE disposal_method = 'composting' ORDER BY disposal_date ASC
SELECT location, disposal_method FROM biodegradable_waste_disposal_patterns WHERE disposal_method != 'landfill'
SELECT id, location, waste_type FROM biodegradable_waste_disposal_patterns LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_disposal_patterns WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY disposal_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_disposals FROM biodegradable_waste_disposal_patterns WHERE waste_type = 'Organic' GROUP BY location HAVING total_disposals > 5 ORDER BY total_disposals DESC
SELECT DISTINCT disposal_method FROM biodegradable_waste_disposal_patterns ORDER BY disposal_method ASC
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_disposal_patterns WHERE disposal_method IN ('Composting', 'Landfill') AND disposal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT id, location, disposal_date FROM biodegradable_waste_disposal_patterns WHERE disposal_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY location ASC, disposal_date DESC
SELECT * FROM BiodegradableWasteDisposal;
SELECT user_id, disposal_date, disposed_weight, disposal_location FROM BiodegradableWasteDisposal ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, disposal_location FROM BiodegradableWasteDisposal WHERE disposed_weight > 100;
SELECT disposal_location, disposed_weight FROM BiodegradableWasteDisposal WHERE disposal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT area_id, area_name, suggested_action FROM ImprovementAreas ORDER BY area_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM BiodegradableWasteDisposal ORDER BY disposal_date DESC, disposed_weight ASC
SELECT user_id, disposal_location FROM BiodegradableWasteDisposal WHERE disposed_weight > 100 ORDER BY user_id
SELECT * FROM ImprovementAreas WHERE area_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT area_name, improvement_measure FROM ImprovementAreas WHERE area_name LIKE 'S%'
SELECT * FROM BiodegradableWasteDisposal WHERE disposal_location = 'Landfill'
SELECT * FROM Biodegradable_Waste_Disposal_Patterns;
SELECT disposal_location, disposal_date FROM Biodegradable_Waste_Disposal_Patterns WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT CITY, REGION FROM COLLECTION_AREAS;
SELECT disposal_amount, waste_type FROM Biodegradable_Waste_Disposal_Patterns ORDER BY disposal_amount DESC;
SELECT plan_id, action_plan FROM Improvement_Plans WHERE implementation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Biodegradable_Waste_Disposal_Patterns ORDER BY disposal_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT disposal_location, waste_type, disposal_amount FROM Biodegradable_Waste_Disposal_Patterns WHERE disposal_amount > 100 ORDER BY disposal_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, disposal_location FROM Biodegradable_Waste_Disposal_Patterns WHERE waste_type = 'Organic' AND disposal_location LIKE '%Park%';
SELECT * FROM Collection_Areas WHERE city = 'New York' AND region = 'Northeast';
SELECT ca.area_name, ip.action_plan FROM Collection_Areas ca JOIN Improvement_Plans ip ON ca.area_id = ip.area_id WHERE ip.implementation_date >= CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT * FROM BiodegradableWasteDisposalPatterns;
SELECT location, disposal_date FROM BiodegradableWasteDisposalPatterns WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM WasteType WHERE id = 1;
SELECT type_name, description FROM WasteType WHERE id = 2;
SELECT region_name, region_code FROM DisposalRegion;
SELECT * FROM BiodegradableWasteDisposalPatterns;
SELECT id, location, disposal_date FROM BiodegradableWasteDisposalPatterns WHERE disposal_method = 'Landfill' ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_disposals FROM BiodegradableWasteDisposalPatterns GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY total_disposals DESC;

SELECT dp.id, dp.location, wt.type_name FROM BiodegradableWasteDisposalPatterns dp INNER JOIN WasteType wt ON dp.disposal_method = wt.type_name WHERE dp.disposal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT dr.region_name, ia.area_name, ia.improvement_strategy FROM DisposalRegion dr JOIN ImprovementAreas ia ON dr.id = ia.id ORDER BY dr.region_name, ia.area_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM BiodegradableWaste;
SELECT id, waste_type, disposal_location FROM BiodegradableWaste WHERE disposal_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_name, city, region FROM DisposalLocation ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT collector_id, name, phone_number, email FROM WasteCollector WHERE name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_date, analysis_result FROM WasteAnalysis WHERE analysis_result = 'Biodegradable' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM BiodegradableWaste WHERE disposal_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT disposal_location, COUNT(*) AS waste_count FROM BiodegradableWaste GROUP BY disposal_location ORDER BY waste_count DESC;

SELECT w.name, ws.collection_day, ws.collection_time, wcl.phone_number FROM WasteCollector w JOIN CollectionSchedule ws ON w.collector_id = ws.schedule_id JOIN WasteAnalysis wa ON ws.location_name = wa.location_name JOIN WasteCollector wcl ON wa.location_name = wcl.name;
SELECT * FROM DisposalLocation WHERE city = 'New York' AND region = 'USA';
SELECT disposal_location, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, disposal_date, CURDATE())) AS avg_days_to_dispose FROM BiodegradableWaste GROUP BY disposal_location ORDER BY avg_days_to_dispose DESC LIMIT 5;
